short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds features and extensions for the bushtarion web game (formerly Antisback's bushtarion toolkit)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds features and extensions for the bushtarion web game, appends calculations and helpful tools into the game to provide general quality of life features
